code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ShiftManager=_ref=>{let{shifts,setShifts}=_ref;const[newShift,setNewShift]=useState({name:'',startTime:'',endTime:'',description:''});const handleInputChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setNewShift({...newShift,[name]:value});};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();const shiftToAdd={...newShift,id:`shift-${Date.now()}`};setShifts([...shifts,shiftToAdd]);setNewShift({name:'',startTime:'',endTime:'',description:''});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"shift-manager",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Shift Management"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"shift-manager-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"shift-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Existing Shifts"}),shifts.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"no-shifts",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"no-shifts-icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No shifts defined yet"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"shifts-grid",children:shifts.map(shift=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"shift-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"shift-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:shift.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"shift-time",children:[shift.startTime," - ",shift.endTime]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"shift-description",children:shift.description})]},shift.id))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"shift-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Create New Shift"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Shift Name*"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"name",value:newShift.name,onChange:handleInputChange,required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Start Time*"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"time",name:"startTime",value:newShift.startTime,onChange:handleInputChange,required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"End Time*"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"time",name:"endTime",value:newShift.endTime,onChange:handleInputChange,required:true})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Description"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{name:"description",value:newShift.description,onChange:handleInputChange})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"submit-btn",children:"Create Shift"})]})]})]})]});};export default ShiftManager;
